articles.content:
Syracuse, N.Y. Since they were essentially shut down two months ago, Central New York dentists have spent up to $30,000 apiece to get ready to resume their normal practices again.
They have no idea … [+5980 chars]

articles.title: WHO says the Americas are new COVID-19 epicenter as deaths surge in Latin America - msnNOW
articles.description: Latin America has passed Europe and the United States in daily infections, she said.
articles.content: Relatives react during the burial of 64-year-old Raimunda Conceicao Souza, who died from COVID-19, at Vila Formosa cemetery, Brazil's biggest cemetery, in Sao Paulo, Brazil, May 22, 2020. REUTERS/Ama… [+6628 chars]
